Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI seems to provide positive comments to whatever I've done.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: As I study health sciences, my teachers were clinicians and their feedback includes their clinical encounters which I think GenAI does not have.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: GenAI is a very good language teacher to help me improve my academic writing. While teachers focus more on the content itself.
